author: Stephanie Hogan
title: Still not sure how to best get groceries during a pandemic? Health experts have some answers
description: Grocery shopping is deemed essential during this pandemic. But it comes with plenty of questions and concerns. We try to provide some clarity.
content: We continue to get questions almost daily about grocery shopping during the COVID-19 pandemic everything from the importance of disinfecting the carts and baskets, to how best to practise physical distancing while shopping, and whether to disinfect everything… [+6834 chars]
